actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to clarify that State and local permitting requirements relating to the processing, sorting, or transporting of solid waste apply to rail carriers.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Commission Termination Act of 1995 to provide that specified provisions of such Act shall not be construed to exempt a rail carrier from state and local permitting requirements relating to the processing, sorting, or transporting of solid waste.

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to clarify that State and local permitting requirements relating to the processing, sorting, or transporting of solid waste apply to rail carriers.
